22#ifndef __BITSTREAM_H__
23#define __BITSTREAM_H__
24
25typedef struct {
26 int length;
27 unsigned char *data;
28 int datasize;
29} BitStream;
30
31extern BitStream *BitStream_new(void);
32extern int BitStream_append(BitStream *bstream, BitStream *arg);
33extern int BitStream_appendNum(BitStream *bstream, int bits, unsigned int num);
34extern int BitStream_appendBytes(BitStream *bstream, int size, unsigned char *data);
35#define BitStream_size(__bstream__) (__bstream__->length)
36#define BitStream_reset(__bstream__) (__bstream__->length = 0)
37extern unsigned char *BitStream_toByte(BitStream *bstream);
38extern void BitStream_free(BitStream *bstream);
39
40#endif /* __BITSTREAM_H__ */
41
